Package com.ex5adiyakobymichaelzargari.springSecurity

Class SecurityJavaConfig

java.lang.Object
com.ex5adiyakobymichaelzargari.springSecurity.SecurityJavaConfig
@Configuration public class SecurityJavaConfig extends Object
SecurityJavaConfig configures the security settings for the application using Java configuration.
